p: 125I seeds were produced by Beijing Science and Technology Biotechnology Co. Ltd. (Beijing, China). Dimensions: length = 4.5 mm, diameter = 0.8 mm, effective radiation radius of 15-20 mm, half-life of 59.43 d, energy of 27.4 keV for X rays and 35.5 keV for R rays. The stent was a biliary stent produced by Nanjing Minitron Co. Ltd. (Nanjing, China) with a diameter of 10 mm and length of 40-80 mm.
